name: The Best Frikin' Party Dip Ever!
author: Katie-Kate
summary: This dip is hearty and a crowd pleaser. The 'boys' love the spice and the women love how easy it was to make. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package bulk hot pork sausage (such as Jimmy Dean®)
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)
directions: Stir the sausage and onions together in a large skillet over medium-high heat until browned and crumbly, about 8 minutes
Drain the grease off of the sausage in a mesh strainer, then return to the skillet
Stir in the cream cheese and diced tomatoes until the cheese has melted and the mixture begins to bubble
